meta.title: Humble battery systems for Gaffers | Humble
meta.description: Silent battery power for lighting setups. Power your rig anywhere without generator noise or restrictions.

hero.title: Power Lighting Setups Anywhere
hero.description: No refueling. No noise. More power than a 7000 watt generator. 60A silent power for professional lighting packages. No permits, no noise complaints, no limits.

items.title: Get Approved for Impossible Locations
items.description: Hotels, rooftops, retail spaces, historic buildings. Silent operation means yes from venues that always say no to generators.

items.title: Clean Power for Sensitive Equipment
items.description: Your lighting package isn't competing with generator noise or flicker. Clean, stable power for HMIs, LEDs, and sensitive electronics.

items.title: Deploy Faster, Wrap Faster
items.description: Under 5 minutes to power on. No fuel logistics, no fire watch, no generator babysitting. Your crew focuses on lighting, not the power.

items.title: True 60A Bates Output
items.description: Professional 60A Bates connector powers full lighting packages. No adapters, no workarounds. Use your existing distribution just like with a generator.

items.title: Silent Operation
items.description: Zero noise during operation. Perfect for sound-sensitive shoots and locations where generator noise creates problems with neighbors or talent.

items.title: Indoor-Safe Power
items.description: Zero emissions make it safe for occupied indoor spaces. Power lighting setups in hotel ballrooms, retail environments, and galleries.

items.title: Professional Reliability
items.description: LFP chemistry, BMS protection, real-time monitoring. Built for the demands of professional production with redundant safety systems.
